mapper.select: select g.goodsid,g.goodsname,g.goodsdesc,g.goodsunitprice,g.goodsimagename,g.sellcount,g.goodsdate,gt.typename from tb_Goods g join tb_Goods_Type gt where g.typeid=gt.typeid
mapper.sql: goodsId, goodsName, typeId, goodsDesc, goodsUnitPrice, goodsImageName, sellCount, goodsDate
mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods (goodsId, goodsName, typeId, goodsDesc, goodsUnitPrice, goodsImageName, sellCount, goodsDate) values (#{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsunitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsimagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_goods
goodsId,
goodsName,
typeId,
goodsDesc,
goodsUnitPrice,
goodsImageName,
sellCount,
goodsDate,
#{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsunitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{goodsimagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sellcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update tb_goods
goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
typeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsDesc = #{goodsdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsUnitPrice = #{goodsunitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goodsImageName = #{goodsimagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sellCount = #{sellcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goodsDate = #{goodsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_goods set goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeId = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsDesc = #{goodsdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsUnitPrice = #{goodsunitprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goodsImageName = #{goodsimagename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sellCount = #{sellcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsDate = #{goodsdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where goodsId = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
